name: Drake
content: I like Ryan Gosling as an actor. I watch all of his movies, and he's Canadian and I just like his swag. I read his interviews and I'm a big fan of his.

name: Shia LaBeouf
content: DON’T LET YOUR DREAMS BE DREAMS!

name: Ron Swanson
content: Never half-ass two things. Whole-ass one thing.

name: Ron Swanson
content: No home is complete without a proper toolbox. Here’s April and Andy’s: A hammer, a half eaten pretzel, a baseball card, some cartridge that says Sonic and Hedgehog, a scissor half, a flashlight filled with jellybeans.

name: Ron Swanson
content: When people get a little too chummy with me I like to call them by the wrong name to let them know I don’t really care about them.

name: Ron Swanson
content: Friends: one to three is sufficient.

name: Ron Swanson
content: Creativity is for people with glasses who like to lie.

name: Ron Swanson
content: Is Star Wars the one with the wizard boy?
